SELECT a.carryover AS CARRY_OVER, b.customerCode AS CUSTOMER_CODE, b.customername AS CUSTOMER_NAME, b.deposit AS DEPOSIT, b.withdrawal AS WITHDRAWAL, a.carryover + b.deposit - b.withdrawal AS BALANCE FROM (SELECT NVL(MAX(b.carryover), 0) AS carryover FROM
(SELECT j.CUSTOMER_CODE AS customerCode, SUM(NVL(j.LEFT_DEBTOR_PRICE, 0)) AS deposit, SUM(NVL(j.RIGHT_CREDITS_PRICE, 0)) AS withdrawal FROM journal j , slip s WHERE j.SLIP_NO = s.SLIP_NO AND s.REPORTING_DATE BETWEEN to_date(#{fromDate},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND to_date(#{toDate},'yyyy-mm-dd') GROUP BY j.CUSTOMER_CODE ) a, (SELECT NVL(SUM(NVL(j.LEFT_DEBTOR_PRICE, 0)) - SUM(NVL(j.RIGHT_CREDITS_PRICE, 0)), 0) AS carryover , j.CUSTOMER_CODE AS customercode FROM journal j , slip s WHERE j.SLIP_NO = s.SLIP_NO AND to_date(s.REPORTING_DATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd') < to_date(#{fromDate},'yyyy-mm-dd') GROUP BY j.CUSTOMER_CODE) b
WHERE a.customerCode = b.customercode) a, (SELECT j.CUSTOMER_CODE AS customerCode, SUM(NVL(j.LEFT_DEBTOR_PRICE, 0)) AS deposit, SUM(NVL(j.RIGHT_CREDITS_PRICE, 0)) AS withdrawal, c.CUSTOMER_NAME AS CUSTOMERNAME FROM journal j , slip s ,CUSTOMER c WHERE j.SLIP_NO = s.SLIP_NO and j.CUSTOMER_CODE=c.CUSTOMER_CODE AND to_date(s.REPORTING_DATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd') BETWEEN to_date(#{fromDate},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND to_date(#{toDate},'yyyy-mm-dd') GROUP BY j.CUSTOMER_CODE , C.CUSTOMER_NAME ) b

SELECT s.REPORTING_DATE as reportingDate ,a.account_name as accountName ,NVL(j.left_debtor_price,0) as leftDebtorPrice ,NVL(j.RIGHT_CREDITS_PRICE,0) as rightCreditsPrice FROM slip s ,journal j ,account a WHERE s.SLIP_NO=j.SLIP_NO AND j.ACCOUNT_INNER_CODE=a.ACCOUNT_INNER_CODE AND j.customer_code=#{customerCode}
